member.name: IAppxContentGroupMapWriter.AddAutomaticFile
member.summary: Adds files to an automatic content group in a content group map.
member.param: The name of the file to be added to the automatic content group.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxContentGroupMapWriter.AddAutomaticGroup
member.summary: Adds an automatic content group to the content group map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxContentGroupMapWriter
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for a content group map.
